content: I have three Apollo BTC devices. One is a full node package and the other two are only hashboards. I will also include two PSUs, one is an 850 watt and the other is 650 watt. They work great, but I am getting out of the mining game. Message me for more details.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: vintag386 on June 17, 2022, 02:54:12 PMI have three Apollo BTC devices. One is a full node package and the other two are only hashboards. I will also include two PSUs, one is an 850 watt and the other is 650 watt. They work great, but I am getting out of the mining game. Message me for more details. How much are you asking for one Futurebit Apollo device (if you sell them separately), and in what countries are you shipping?Maybe you should update your location and post your price in public with more details, someone could contact you for negotiations if possible
